testcase.name: runScenario["User creates an account successfully", "Create Account Test"](1)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User creates an account successfully # src/test/resources/features/01_CreateAccountTest.feature:2 Given I am on the home page # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_am_on_the_home_page() When I navigate to the create account page # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CreateAccountSteps.i_navigate_to_the_create_account_page() Then I should see the create account page title # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CreateAccountSteps.i_should_see_the_create_account_page_title() When I fill in the account details # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CreateAccountSteps.i_fill_in_the_account_details() And I click the create account button # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CreateAccountSteps.i_click_the_create_account_button() Then I should see the success message # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CreateAccountSteps.i_should_see_the_success_message() And I should be redirected to the account page # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CreateAccountSteps.i_should_be_redirected_to_the_account_page() Then I sign out # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_sign_out()

testcase.name: runScenario["User signs in and signs out successfully", "Sign In Test"](2)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User signs in and signs out successfully # src/test/resources/features/02_SignInTest.feature:2 Given I am on the home page # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_am_on_the_home_page() When I sign in # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_sign_in() Then I should see my username displayed # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.SignInSteps.i_should_see_my_username_displayed() Then I sign out # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_sign_out()

testcase.name: runScenario["Verify page filters functionality", "Check page filters and wish list"](3)
testcase.system-out: Scenario: Verify page filters functionality # src/test/resources/features/03_CheckPageFiltersAndWishListTest.feature:8 Given I am on the home page # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_am_on_the_home_page() And I sign in # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_sign_in() When I hover the Women dropdown on the store menu # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_hover_the_women_dropdown_on_the_store_menu() And I hover over the Tops dropdown # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_hover_over_the_tops_dropdown() And I click on the Jacket menu option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_click_on_the_jacket_menu_option() And I click on the Color menu option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_click_on_the_color_menu_option() And I choose a color # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_choose_a_color() Then I should see all displayed products with the selected color bordered in red # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_should_see_all_displayed_products_with_the_selected_color_bordered_in_red() When I click on the Price dropdown and select the first option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_click_on_the_price_dropdown_and_select_the_first_option() And I check each displayed product should have a price within the range selected # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_check_displayed_products_prices()

testcase.system-out: Scenario: Add items in the wish list # src/test/resources/features/04_WishListTest.feature:16 Given I am on the home page # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_am_on_the_home_page() And I sign in # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_hover_over_the_tops_dropdown() And I click on the Jacket menu option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_click_on_the_jacket_menu_option() And I click on the Color menu option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_click_on_the_color_menu_option() And I choose a color # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_choose_a_color() Then I should see all displayed products with the selected color bordered in red # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_should_see_all_displayed_products_with_the_selected_color_bordered_in_red() When I click on the Price dropdown and select the first option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_check_displayed_products_prices() Then I remove the Price filter # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.WishListSteps.i_remove_the_Price_filter() Then I check that the items number displayed is increased # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.WishListSteps.the_items_number_displayed_is_increased() When I add the first item to the Wish List # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.WishListSteps.i_add_the_first_item_to_the_Wish_List() Then I see a successful message with text and icon # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.WishListSteps.i_see_a_successful_message_with_text_and_icon() Element to wishListCounter: 1 DASdasdASdAS: 1 item Then I check that the correct number of items is displayed in My Wish List # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.WishListSteps.i_check_the_right_number_of_items_is_displayed_in_my_wish_list()

testcase.system-out: Scenario: Add items to Shopping Cart and verify the total # src/test/resources/features/04_WishListTest.feature:23 Given I am on the home page # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_am_on_the_home_page() And I sign in # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.common.CommonSteps.i_sign_in() When I hover the Women dropdown on the store menu # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_hover_the_women_dropdown_on_the_store_menu() And I hover over the Tops dropdown # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_hover_over_the_tops_dropdown() And I click on the Jacket menu option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_click_on_the_jacket_menu_option() And I click on the Color menu option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_click_on_the_color_menu_option() And I choose a color # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_choose_a_color() Then I should see all displayed products with the selected color bordered in red # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_should_see_all_displayed_products_with_the_selected_color_bordered_in_red() When I click on the Price dropdown and select the first option # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_click_on_the_price_dropdown_and_select_the_first_option() And I check each displayed product should have a price within the range selected # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.CheckPageFiltersSteps.i_check_displayed_products_prices() When I add all displayed items to the shopping cart selecting appropriate sizes # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.ShoppingCartSteps.i_add_all_displayed_items_by_selecting_appropriate_sizes() Then I check a success message with a confirmation icon should be displayed # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.ShoppingCartSteps.i_check_success_message() When I click on the shopping cart link in the success message # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.ShoppingCartSteps.i_click_on_the_shopping_cart_link_in_the_success_message() Then I check that the Shopping Cart page should be displayed # com.softwaretestingboard.magento.steps.ShoppingCartSteps.i_check_displayed_shopping_cart_page() expectedSum: 56.25 totalItemSum: 56.25 And I check that the sum of the prices for all items should equal the Order Total in the Summary section #
